incidents.name: We are currently experiencing a partial outage in Google editor

incident_updates.body: This incident has been resolved.
We are continuing to work with Google to find a resolution. Thank you for your patience.

We are currently experiencing a partial outage in Google editor. We are working with Google to find a resolution. We expect that some users may not be able to open some Word, Excel, .gdoc or .gsheet files in the Google editor until this is resolved.

incidents.name: Some users may not be able to access .gdoc, .gsheet, .gslides documents right now, nor will they be able to open up Microsoft documents in the Google editor.

incident_updates.body: This incident has been resolved.

Some users may not be able to access .gdoc, .gsheet, .gslides documents right now, nor will they be able to open up Microsoft documents in the Google editor. We are aware and working to fix the problem as quickly as we can. We’ll share another update shortly.
